prompt: Edit the uploaded photo. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical — all features unchanged. Eyelashes and eyebrows exactly as original — no modification. SKIN: Radiant, healthy, visible pores. Add [FLOWER_TYPE] intertwined naturally in hair — organic floral arrangement, randomly placed, realistic look. ADD if light blue roses: Change outfit to reveal exposed collarbone, tie a thin matching-color ribbon around neck. SETUP: Soft natural studio lighting, subtle shadows. Shallow depth of field, editorial beauty style. [BG_COLOR] background. Sharp focus, natural skin detail, visible pores. Original dimensions.
